name: Cartoon Me HD
description:
"Cartoon Me" lets you create beautiful cartoon drawings with the touch of a finger.

Use your own photos to add cartoon and art effects.

Transform them instantly into awesome cartoons with the press of a button.

Or draw them by hand, with a few artistic swipes of your finger.

Either style, will give you a fabulous cartoon.

Features:
- Straightforward and streamlined interface.
- Toggle between B&W and Color to add beautiful effects.
- Choose from an selection of brush strokes and paper.
- Adjust the cartoon effect, background and color to create unique effects.

It's fun and easy to turn yourself and friends into awesome Cartoons!


- All screenshots were created with this App.
